laboratory_examinations.findings: Total bilirubin: 3.0; Lipase: >1200; Staphylococcus epidermidis, Corynebacterium species (diphtheroids)

Trace right-sided pleural effusion; Multiple small stones in gallbladder and cystic duct; Mild gallbladder wall thickening; Mild edema/trace pericholecystic fluid; Common bile duct normal (0.7 cm); Multiple cystic lesions in pancreas; Normal caliber main pancreatic duct; 1.9 cm left adrenal lesion; No hydronephrosis bilaterally.
